sense.def:
To succeed in doing something
pomeni biti uspešen v prizadevanjih, da bi nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: I succeeded in getting the job.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
succeeds
, privede do želenega rezultata ali uspešno deluje.

seg.quote: Nobody expected that strike to succeed.

sense.def:
To succeed
pomeni doseči visok položaj na področju svojega delovanja, na primer v poklicnem življenju.

To succeed a person
pomeni biti naslednji, ki dobi delovno mesto ali položaj določene osebe.

seg.quote: Somebody's got to succeed Murray as editor.
Elizabeth succeeded to the throne in 1952.

sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
succeeds another
, se zgodi za drugo.

seg.quote: The first demand would be succeeded by others.
In the succeeding months, little was heard about him.
